name: Earth Rising
description:
Earth Rising - A game about building CubeSat and learning more about this small satellite and how it functions.
You are in the role of a robot that has a mission to put into space as many CubeSat satellites as you can so you can find different resources for future space flight development.

Build a realistic custom CubeSat satellite with over 20 components like a power supply, payload controller, camera, onboard computer, etc.
Learn about small satellites with a short description of every component and learn how CubeSat satellite is built.

Get data from your satellite about the composition of nearby asteroids, the Moon, or the inner earth crust.

FEATURES

  • Build a realistic CubeSat satellite
  • Learn about CubeSat components
  • Use a soldering iron to weld chips into motherboards




The project was co-financed by the European Union from the European Social Fund.
The creation of the video game was co-financed by the European Union from the European Social Fund.
The project is co-financed by the Office for NGOs of the Government of the Republic of Croatia.
The content of the video game is the sole responsibility of the Igra znjana association.
